boardgame.name: King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Forge
boardgame.description: The Chamberlain is searching the realm for a new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Craftmaster to the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and sets a contest for all of the smiths and crafters in the land. The first one to forge four items from a list of the King's favorite weapons and trinkets will be honored as First Among Crafters and Smiths. But watch out, because the other crafters and smiths will try to outdo you at every opportunity. Are you ready to forge your destiny?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In King's Forge, players are craftsmen and craftswomen seeking to become the favorite of the King. A variety of dice represent the raw materials (metal, wood, gems, and enchantment) and those same dice can be used to gather new dice and purchase roll-modifiers, or saved and rolled in an attempt to meet the requirements to craft the items on the King's list. An early lead is not a sure path to victory and other players will out-maneuver and out-build you whenever possible. Careful dice management, advance planning, fierce competition, and nail-biting luck will carry you to winner's circle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a great game. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s got best of many game realms, was created by a board gamer and got a very healthy Kickstarter project to back these claims up :) I know, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been one of those Kickstarters! However, now I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m moving countries and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling all my games, as it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d be way too expensive to take them with me. Includes Queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Jubilee. Contents are intact, box is like new - and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the very first release, too! Loving and caring new owners only, please :)
